parameters: This is where I'd put a cyoa if i had one
We double the dice roll since we go two steps for each pip
\af[\V[5]]\n<\N[\V[5]]>* BEEP * HELLO FELLOW BIRD NICE BIRD WEATHER.
MY SENSORS INDICATE THAT YOU MAY BE A FRIEND. I LIKE TO CALL MY REGULAR BIRD EYES SENSORS.
What brings a big strong fowl like you round these parts?
I came here to sharpen my skill, prehaps we share a goal.
\af[\V[5]]\n<\N[\V[5]]>Fine, just don't get in my way.
\af[\V[5]]\n<\N[\V[5]]>Perhaps... it had to be this way. WAIT NO AAAAHH FUCK AAAAAAA-
\af[\V[5]]\n<\N[\V[5]]>Hey there skipper, makin' slow progress south I see.
\af[\V[5]]\n<\N[\V[5]]>Roger that good buddy, prepare for takeoff!
\af[\V[5]]\n<\N[\V[5]]>*the bird seems to be willing, though it is difficult to tell through their foul mimicry of the tongues of men*
\af[\V[5]]\n<\N[\V[5]]>Its a pleasure to meet you, would you care to hear about some investment opportunities?
\af[\V[5]]\n<\N[\V[5]]>Glad to be working with you. Now, lets talk portfolio.
\af[\V[5]]\n<\N[\V[5]]>You'll be hearing from my lawyers about this!
You look weary from your journey.
\af[\V[5]]\n<\N[\V[5]]>If we combine our might, we will be unstoppable.
Your flock is full. Choose a social reject to exile.
\af[\V[2]]\n<\N[\V[2]]>GOOD BIRD I MEAN BIRD BYE I MEAN *click* *whirrrr*
\af[\V[2]]\n<\N[\V[2]]>noooo don't go you're so sexy aha~
\af[\V[2]]\n<\N[\V[2]]>Heh, I was better on my own anyway. \| \|tch
\af[\V[2]]\n<\N[\V[2]]>You're walking away from a life changing opportunity!
\N[\V[2]] was exiled for the crime of dying, which is illegal.
CHOOSE WHO SHALL CONSUME THE SACRIFICE.
5 - Class of bird it absorbed flesh from
Parrot gets a skill from the class of the bird they absorbed
With flesh comes knowledge.\| Those who speak it understand.\|
Every other bird gets a random skill from their class
Penguin gets special case because they have more moves to learn
\N[\V[2]] gained additional skill '\V[8]' thanks to their buisness management training.
